meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1205.

td.p: Don Steiner, a graduate student originally from Salem, Oregon
Tom Mills, a psychiatrist from San Francisco, California
Lisa Guay, a homemaker from Champlain, New York (whose 3-day cash winnings total $29,401)

tr.td: STARTS WITH "M"
MIDDLE AGES
MAGIC
MEDICINE
MUSEUMS
MORTAL MATTERS

And all of their frustrations /

Title of the following 1989 hit about a man & his late father
"Every generation /
Blames the one before /
And all of their frustrations /
Come beating on your door..."
